title: Denizen
description:
Apply for a job at one of the local businesses to make a steady income, pick up a side hustle to get paid on the go, or help out the locals for some extra cash. Lossless Scaling
TAKE A BREAK Pick out a new ride at a local car dealership , find some fresh apparel at the clothing store, and then visit the local casino, club, or bar to relax and unwind after work.
SETTLE IN Choose from a variety of residences to rent and own including suburban houses and apartment buildings, and then customize it with your own selection of furniture and finishings.
STAY IN TOUCH Use your smartphone to apply for a job, manage your tasks , and find a place to live. Play your favorite tracks with the music app, and use the banking app to manage your finances.

game_info.Genre: Adventure, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Early Access
